projects.name: Jmart (jmart.kz)
projects.stack: React, Next.js TypeScript, Redux (Toolkit, Saga, Reselect), Zustand, ChakraUI, Styled-Components, Webpack, Microbundle, Node (Express), Turborepo
highlights: Maintained and developed an own custom SSR solution on Express and Node.js.
Contributed to the development of a UI library (pyatka-ui).
Developed and maintained a wrapper for our REST API services (pyatka-sdk).
Improved a website performance (Lighthouse, CSR, LCP). Search engine optimization (SEO): microdata, meta-tags, open-graph.
Added code-splitting to reduce bundle size and improve load time. Added virtualization to the product list with infinite scrolling to ensure smooth page performance.
Participated in migrating the project from legacy (Webpack, React 17) to Next.js 14 and Turborepo.
Assisted with setting up the Dockerfile and build configuration.
Participated in architectural decision-making and technology selection.

projects.name: 1. Electronic Document Management (EDM) System
highlights: Developed electronic document signing (EDS) using biometrics via facial recognition through a webcam.
Refactored legacy code, updated dependencies, and migrated the project from an old deprecated UI library to a new one.
Developed automation and digitalization solutions for the bank's internal document workflow and business processes previously handled on paper.

projects.name: 2. Alpha Space (Enterprise Portal / Intranet)
projects.stack: React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, React Query, Tailwind CSS
highlights: Developed an admin panel for managing news and banners with Editor.js.

projects.name: DAR Management System (DMS)
projects.stack: React, Next.js, Redux Saga, Nivo charts, Jest, React Testing Library, Material UI
highlights: Developed a tool (Researcher), to analyze and compare competitors' social media, websites, and apps (with Rival IQ and SimilarWeb integration).
Developed a tool (Ad-manager), to manage all company ads (Google Adsense, Facebook Ads) from one platform.
Wrote unit tests using Jest and React Testing Library.

awards.title: Hackathon, 2nd place
awards.summary: Project: Real-time collaborative drawing on a canvas (Socket.IO, Express, p5.JS)

skills.name: Technologies
keywords: Material UI, Chakra UI, Ant design

projects.name: Cartoon Beta
projects.summary: IMDB clone for cartoons, anime, etc. Uses TheMovieDB API (20k+ cartoons) and VK API (for news).
